document.heading: D.C. Regional Interstate Banking Act of 1985 Clarification Temporary Amendment Act of 1993

history.narrative: Law 10-27, the “D.C. Regional Interstate Banking Act of 1985 Clarification Temporary Amendment Act of 1993,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 10-304. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 15, 1993, and July 29, 1993, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 20, 1993, it was assigned Act No. 10-59 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 10-27 became effective on October 5, 1993.
